structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: A price advisory council is hereby established in each agency which shall be entirely separate from the board of commissioners. Said price advisory council shall consist of seven (7) persons who shall be appointed for terms of four (4) years in the same manner provided herein for appointment of commissioners. Said price advisory council shall be required to pass upon the propriety of all proposed prices fixed for either purchase or sale of any real estate.
